filmography.title: The Return of Frank James
filmography.role_description: A spirited newspaper reporter who becomes involved with the outlaw Frank James; Tierney's film debut.
filmography.plot: Frank James seeks revenge for the death of his brother Jesse, while a reporter tries to chronicle his story.

filmography.title: Hudson's Bay
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a jailed nobleman who seeks the help of French trappers to free her brother.
filmography.plot: Two French trappers convince King Charles II to back their plan for a fur trading post in Hudson's Bay.

filmography.title: Tobacco Road
filmography.role_description: A dirt-poor, unkempt girl living in rural Georgia in John Ford's adaptation of the controversial play.
filmography.plot: A poor sharecropper family in the rural South struggles to keep their farm during the Great Depression.

filmography.title: Belle Starr
filmography.role_description: A Southern aristocrat who becomes a notorious outlaw leader during the Reconstruction era.
filmography.plot: After the Civil War, a Southern woman turns to a life of banditry to fight against carpetbaggers.

filmography.title: The Shanghai Gesture
filmography.role_description: A rebellious young woman who becomes addicted to gambling and descends into the underworld of a Shanghai casino.
filmography.plot: A gambling queen in Shanghai seeks revenge on the man who abandoned her years ago, using his daughter as a pawn.

filmography.title: Son of Fury: The Story of Benjamin Blake
filmography.role_description: A beautiful South Seas islander who falls in love with a fugitive English nobleman.
filmography.plot: A young man fights to reclaim his rightful inheritance from his scheming uncle in 18th-century England.

filmography.title: Rings on Her Fingers
filmography.role_description: A shopgirl enlisted by con artists to pose as a wealthy woman, who ends up falling for their mark.
filmography.plot: A shopgirl is hired by swindlers to help them fleece a millionaire, but she falls in love with him instead.

filmography.title: Thunder Birds
filmography.role_description: A woman living on an Arizona ranch who is caught in a love triangle between a flight instructor and a British trainee.
filmography.plot: A veteran WWI pilot trains cadets for World War II while competing with a British student for the love of a local woman.

filmography.title: China Girl
filmography.role_description: A Vassar-educated Chinese woman who helps an American newsreel photographer in WWII-torn Burma.
filmography.plot: An American newsreel photographer in China aids the resistance against the Japanese invasion.

filmography.title: Heaven Can Wait
filmography.role_description: The loving but often betrayed wife of a charming playboy who pleads his case to Satan.
filmography.plot: A deceased playboy arrives in Hell and recounts his life of debauchery to Satan to prove he belongs there.

filmography.title: Laura
filmography.role_description: A sophisticated advertising executive whose murder investigation leads a detective to fall in love with her portrait.
filmography.plot: A police detective falls in love with the woman whose murder he is investigating.

filmography.title: A Bell for Adano
filmography.role_description: A local Italian woman who dyes her hair blonde to protest the war and befriends the American Major occupying her town.
filmography.plot: An American major tries to win the trust of the locals in a war-torn Italian village by replacing their town bell.

filmography.title: Leave Her to Heaven
filmography.role_description: A beautiful but pathologically jealous woman who destroys anyone who diverts her husband's attention.
filmography.plot: A writer falls in love with a young socialite, only to discover that her obsessive love for him is deadly.

filmography.title: Dragonwyck
filmography.role_description: A naive farm girl who marries a wealthy distant cousin, only to discover the dark secrets of his Gothic estate.
filmography.plot: A young woman discovers that her husband's aristocratic estate is filled with misery and dark family secrets.

filmography.title: The Razor's Edge
filmography.role_description: A socialite who loves a spiritual seeker but marries a wealthy man for security, eventually regretting her choice.
filmography.plot: A traumatized pilot seeks the meaning of life after WWI, rejecting his wealthy fiancée's world for a spiritual journey.

filmography.title: The Ghost and Mrs. Muir
filmography.role_description: A young widow who moves into a seaside cottage and forms a unique, romantic bond with the ghost of a sea captain.
filmography.plot: A young widow forms a unique relationship with the ghost of a seaman and writes his memoirs.

filmography.title: The Iron Curtain
filmography.role_description: The wife of a Soviet cipher clerk who defects to Canada, exposing a spy ring.
filmography.plot: A code clerk at the Soviet embassy in Ottawa defects with documents exposing a Soviet spy ring.

filmography.title: That Wonderful Urge
filmography.role_description: A wealthy heiress who retaliates against a reporter's smear campaign by claiming they are married.
filmography.plot: A reporter writes unflattering articles about an heiress, so she announces that they are married to teach him a lesson.

filmography.title: Whirlpool
filmography.role_description: A kleptomaniac wife of a psychoanalyst who falls under the hypnotic spell of a charlatan astrologer.
filmography.plot: A woman suffering from kleptomania is hypnotized by a charlatan who uses her to frame her for a murder.

filmography.title: Night and the City
filmography.role_description: A nightclub singer who loyally supports a small-time hustler despite his schemes leading to disaster.
filmography.plot: A small-time hustler in London dreams of becoming a wrestling promoter but gets in over his head with the local mob.

filmography.title: Where the Sidewalk Ends
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a murder suspect who falls in love with the brutal detective investigating the case.
filmography.plot: A police detective accidentally kills a suspect and tries to pin it on a gang leader, but falls for the suspect's daughter.

filmography.title: The Mating Season
filmography.role_description: A sophisticated ambassador's daughter who marries a man whose mother poses as their cook.
filmography.plot: A working-class mother poses as a cook to be near her son and his new upper-class wife.

filmography.title: The Secret of Convict Lake
filmography.role_description: A woman living in a snowy mountain village who harbors escaped convicts, falling for one of them.
filmography.plot: Escaped convicts take refuge in a village populated only by women while the men are away.

filmography.title: Close to My Heart
filmography.role_description: A woman desperate to adopt a baby who clashes with her husband when he becomes obsessed with the child's biological background.
filmography.plot: A couple adopts a baby, but the husband becomes obsessed with tracing the child's biological parents, fearing 'bad blood'.

filmography.title: Plymouth Adventure
filmography.role_description: The wife of William Bradford who sails on the Mayflower, caught between her husband and the ship's captain.
filmography.plot: The story of the voyage of the Mayflower and the hardships faced by the Pilgrims.

filmography.title: Never Let Me Go
filmography.role_description: A Russian ballerina who marries an American journalist but is prevented from leaving the Soviet Union.
filmography.plot: An American reporter marries a Russian ballerina, but the Soviet government refuses to let her leave the country.

filmography.title: Personal Affair
filmography.role_description: The wife of a teacher who is accused of having an inappropriate relationship with a student who goes missing.
filmography.plot: A teacher is suspected of murder when a student infatuated with him disappears.

filmography.title: The Egyptian
filmography.role_description: The royal sister of the Pharaoh who harbors secrets about the protagonist's lineage.
filmography.plot: In ancient Egypt, a poor orphan becomes a brilliant physician and travels the known world.

filmography.title: Black Widow
filmography.role_description: The wife of a Broadway producer who gets caught up in a murder mystery when a young writer is found dead in their apartment.
filmography.plot: A Broadway producer is accused of murdering a young woman he was mentoring, and must find the real killer.

filmography.title: The Left Hand of God
filmography.role_description: A nurse at a Chinese mission who falls in love with a man posing as a priest.
filmography.plot: An American pilot posing as a priest in China tries to escape a warlord while protecting a mission.

filmography.title: Advise & Consent
filmography.role_description: A prominent Washington D.C. hostess who navigates the political and social intrigue surrounding a Senate confirmation.
filmography.plot: A Senate investigation into a controversial Secretary of State nominee uncovers secrets and blackmail.

filmography.title: Toys in the Attic
filmography.role_description: A wealthy, mysterious woman whose daughter marries a man with a troubled family history.
filmography.plot: A man returns home with a young bride, stirring up old jealousies and secrets among his spinster sisters.

filmography.title: The Pleasure Seekers
filmography.role_description: A sophisticated woman in Madrid who advises three young Americans on love and romance; Tierney's final film role.
filmography.plot: Three American girls looking for romance and excitement move to Madrid.
